alert.note: Alert for Southern Trinity (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 28 at 3:28PM PST until December 29 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM PST THURSDAY ABOVE 3500 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected above 4000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Southern Trinity and Northeastern Mendocino Interior Counties. This includes South Fork Mountain and other high elevation areas east of there on Highway 36. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 10 AM PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state of California can be obtained by calling 1-800-GAS-ROAD.
